Class MarlinSettings

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.ro3.node.nodes.marlinrobot.marlinrobotarm.marlinsimulation.MarlinSettings
public class MarlinSettings extends Object
MarlinSettings is a class that holds the settings for a MarlinSimulation.
